content: Hi I am a new contributor to rust-analyzer. I am working with ide_completions. I was interested in knowing how you guys test some quick change or debug something in completions sources. I don't use VScode though. I am looking for some native lldb type setup (preferably terminal-based setup). Open to any suggestions! Thanks a lot.
@Manas you may want to ask in #t-compiler/rust-analyzer, youll get faster/better answers there since its the dedicated channel :smile:
i usually just write tests to see if something works, since youll need to write them for the PR anyways

Ahh! My bad. I was told to go to #t-compiler/rust-analyzer but I mistakenly put this here. New to Zulip as well :sweat_smile:
Got it. I will check out the previous tests to get more info on this! Thanks a lot.
